ActNational Energy Board Act
PrecisAppointment of KENNETH R.W. VOLLMAN of Calgary, Alberta, to be a temporary member of the National Energy Board for a term of two years, for the purpose of allowing Mr. Vollman to continue to serve on the Mackenzie Gas Project review.
